Name: brasserie zuiderbad
Review Text: Had an afternoon snack of Bitterballen for the first time one day and went back the next day for a lovely breakfast here on my visit during September of 2018. Friendly helpful staff and delicious food. Located close to the Rijksmuseum.

Name: brasserie zuiderbad
Review Text: Had the pesto tomato and cheese panini, delicious. It was also pretty cheap. Nice place I recommend!
